Game.Name: Sesame Street ABC & 123 (USA)
Game.plot: Sesame Street: ABC/123 is a Miscellaneous game, developed by Rare Ltd. and published by Hi-Tech,which was released in 1991.
Game.Notes: Sesame Street 1 2 3/A B C is a compilation of the following Sesame Street NES games: Sesame Street 1 2 3 Sesame Street A B C
